column1: Smoque BBQ////Smoque BBQ is a great place for barbeque in Chicago. Heck
column2: I even like it more than some bbq places in Texas. Bring your friends
column5: and get that food in your belly! Don't forget to order the bbq beans. Oh
column6: Â and if you have room
column7: the bread pudding is full of cinnamon. It's delicious and I normally hate bread pudding.
